definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

pinyin: Ka3 bo1 xi1 shi4 rou4 liu2

sentences.english: This is a typical staining reaction for sarcomas.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种典型的肉瘤染色反应。

sentences.english: Leiomyosarcoma of the small intestine is an uncommon tumor.
sentences.chinese: 小肠平滑肌肉瘤是一种罕见的肿瘤。

sentences.english: Conclusions Synovial sarcoma of the hypopharynx is a malignant soft-tissue tumor that is seen rarely in the head and neck.
sentences.chinese: 结论喉咽部滑膜肉瘤是头颈部罕见的软组织恶性肿瘤。

sentences.english: Conclusions Caffine had remarkable enhancement effect in cisplatin—induced apoptosis of osteosarcoma cell and osteosarcoma cases.
sentences.chinese: 结论咖啡因有促进顺铂诱导骨肉瘤细胞凋亡的作用。

sentences.english: Conclution Intervention and radiation are better therapies and as the ferst therapy for treatment osteosarcoma in limbs.
sentences.chinese: 结论介入加放疗是肢体骨肉瘤的较好治疗方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the recurrent mechanism and prognosis of primary retroperitoneal liposarcoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨原发性腹膜后脂肪肉瘤复发的机理及预后。

sentences.english: Objective To analysis the diagnosis and therapy of cystosarcoma phyllodes of the breast (CSPB).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨乳腺叶状囊肉瘤的诊断和治疗方法。

sentences.english: The Liposarco-rna always showed inhomogeneous density mass accompanied with lytic bone destruction.
sentences.chinese: 脂肪肉瘤肿块密度不均匀和溶骨性骨质破坏。

sentences.english: Primary leiomyosarcoma of the lung is a rare malignant tumor.
sentences.chinese: 肺原发性平滑肌肉瘤是一种罕见的恶性肿瘤。

sentences.english: The bulk of people who get osteogenesis sarcoma are below age 21.
sentences.chinese: 大多数骨肉瘤患者的年龄在21岁以下。

sentences.english: This is a radiograph of an osteosarcoma involving the metaphyseal region of the distal femur.
sentences.chinese: 线显示股骨远端干骺区的骨肉瘤。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the treatment and prognosis of soft tissue sarcomas in flexor fossae .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨屈窝软组织肉瘤的治疗及预后。

sentences.english: Objective To study the killing effect of Zijin powder extract on human osteosarcoma cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨中药紫金散对人骨肉瘤细胞的杀伤作用。

sentences.english: The pathological characteristics of the tumors developed were similar to that of fibrosarcoma.
sentences.chinese: 且形成肿瘤的病理表现与纤维肉瘤的特征相一致。

sentences.english: Chordoma is a more common tumor in this location than chondrosarcoma.
sentences.chinese: 在这个区域，脊索瘤比软骨肉瘤更常见。

definition: blood tumor/angioma (tumor consisting of a mass of blood vessels)
osteoma (benign tumor composed of bone-like material)
